word:
Chap. 185 - TO A. O. Tait

                                   "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, Aug. 27, 1896. 

                                                            T - 100 - 1896 

Eld. A. O. Tait, 
     Battle Creek, Michigan. 

Dear Brother:- 
     I have not written you much because I knew that that which I should write you would only increase your burden and intensify the painful feelings you must have, while there is no hope that you can in any way relieve the situation.
